title: Bug 7785 SaveAs does not retain the file type
description: When using the SaveAs function, the file type is not retained. Additionally, the icon for the saved file changes from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Make modifications to the file (e.g. move an existing class)
3) Click on the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
4) A dialog box will appear
5) Browse for a valid location to save the file
6) Enter the filename without specifying the extension, as it is not requested
7) Click Ok
8) Observe that the new file is added to the specified location in the Navigator, but the file extension is not shown.
EB: The file type should be retained when using the SaveAs function. The icon for the saved file should remain the same as the parent javafile icon.
SR: Ensure that the file type is preserved when using the SaveAs function. Additionally, the icon for the saved file should not change from the parent javafile icon.
